Sentencas: The chemical states of the surface of (Ln(0.5)Sr(0.5))CoO3-delta (Ln (lanthanides) = Pr, Nd and Sm) used for cathode materials of intermediate temperature operating solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) were investigated by X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis of (Ln1-xSrx) CoO3-δ (Ln: Pr, Nd and Sm)

Sentencas: Oxygen peaks comprised of lower binding energy (LBE) and higher binding energy (HBE) peaks from (Ln(0.5)Sr(0.5))CoO3-delta and Pr0.3Sr0.7CoO3-delta (PSC37) showed that some merged oxygen peak behavior is a function of the Sr and lanthanide concentrations.
Titulo: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis of (Ln1-xSrx) CoO3-δ (Ln: Pr, Nd and Sm)

Sentencas: By investigating the oxygen peaks, it was determined that more oxygen vacancies were generated on the surface of the cathodes when the lanthanides and Sr were substituted into perovskite oxides.
Titulo: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis of (Ln1-xSrx) CoO3-δ (Ln: Pr, Nd and Sm)

Sentencas: When comparing the binding energies (BEs) of PSC37 with Pr0.5Sr0.5CoO3-delta (PSC55), the LBE and HBE of the Sr peaks both increased when Sr was substituted at the A-site of a perovskite.
Titulo: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis of (Ln1-xSrx) CoO3-δ (Ln: Pr, Nd and Sm)

Sentencas: Surface analysis of the Co peak on the surface of the cathode materials showed that the Co exists mainly as Co3+ and partially oxidized to Co4+ on the cathode materials.
Titulo: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis of (Ln1-xSrx) CoO3-δ (Ln: Pr, Nd and Sm)

Sentencas: The partial existence of Co4+ can provide some polaron hopping providing electronic conduction for the solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis of (Ln1-xSrx) CoO3-δ (Ln: Pr, Nd and Sm)
X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis of (Ln1-xSrx) CoO3-δ (Ln: Pr, Nd and Sm)

Titulo: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy analysis of (Ln1-xSrx) CoO3-δ (Ln: Pr, Nd and Sm)
